channel.title: vim on Hello Friend
channel.description: Recent content in vim on Hello Friend

item.title: Vim Intro
item.description: This article: Assumes you already have some vim experiences. Won’t be step-by-step tutorial. Will explain what is happening when you edit ~/.vimrc. Why VIMï¼Ÿ Better understanding of project structures Better understanding of everything Lightweight Multi-language support Addictive All open-source(except some great but awful plugins) Show off Why Not VIM? Learning curve is steep. Lots of shortcuts to remember Lots of plug-ins to learn. If you don’t know it thoroughly, you’ll make a mess of yourself.
